custom-sql.sql: SELECT {CommerceCountry.*} FROM CommerceCountry INNER JOIN CIWarehouse ON CIWarehouse.countryTwoLettersISOCode = CommerceCountry.twoLettersISOCode WHERE (CIWarehouse.companyId = ?) [$ALL$] ORDER BY CommerceCountry.priority

SELECT {CommerceCountry.*} FROM CommerceCountry LEFT JOIN CommerceChannelRel ON CommerceChannelRel.classPK = CommerceCountry.commerceCountryId WHERE (CommerceCountry.active_ = [$TRUE$]) AND ( (CommerceCountry.channelFilterEnabled = [$FALSE$]) OR ( (CommerceCountry.channelFilterEnabled = [$TRUE$]) AND (CommerceChannelRel.classNameId = ?) AND (CommerceChannelRel.commerceChannelId = ?) ) ) [$BILLING$] [$SHIPPING$] ORDER BY CommerceCountry.priority

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommerceOrder.commerceOrderId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM User_ LEFT JOIN CommerceAccountUserRel ON CommerceAccountUserRel.commerceAccountUserId = User_.userId LEFT JOIN Users_Orgs ON Users_Orgs.userId = User_.userId LEFT JOIN Organization_ Org1 ON Org1.organizationId = Users_Orgs.organizationId LEFT JOIN Organization_ Org2 ON (Org1.treePath IS NOT NULL) AND (Org2.treePath LIKE CONCAT(Org1.treePath, '%')) LEFT JOIN CommerceAccountOrganizationRel ON CommerceAccountOrganizationRel.organizationId = Org2.organizationId LEFT JOIN CommerceAccount ON (CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccountUserRel.commerceAccountId) OR (CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccountOrganizationRel.commerceAccountId) LEFT JOIN CommerceOrder ON CommerceOrder.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId WHERE [$ORDER_STATUS$] [$ACCOUNT_ID$] (CommerceOrder.groupId = ?) AND (User_.userId = [$USER_ID$]) AND (LOWER(CommerceAccount.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT DISTINCT {CommerceOrder.*} FROM CommerceOrder INNER JOIN CommerceOrderItem ON CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderId = CommerceOrder.commerceOrderId WHERE (CommerceOrder.groupId = ?) AND (CommerceOrder.orderStatus IN ([$ORDER_STATUS$])) AND (CommerceOrderItem.quantity > CommerceOrderItem.shippedQuantity)

SELECT DISTINCT {CommerceOrder.*} FROM User_ LEFT JOIN CommerceAccountUserRel ON CommerceAccountUserRel.commerceAccountUserId = User_.userId LEFT JOIN Users_Orgs ON Users_Orgs.userId = User_.userId LEFT JOIN Organization_ Org1 ON Org1.organizationId = Users_Orgs.organizationId LEFT JOIN Organization_ Org2 ON (Org1.treePath IS NOT NULL) AND (Org2.treePath LIKE CONCAT(Org1.treePath, '%')) LEFT JOIN CommerceAccountOrganizationRel ON CommerceAccountOrganizationRel.organizationId = Org2.organizationId LEFT JOIN CommerceAccount ON (CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccountUserRel.commerceAccountId) OR (CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccountOrganizationRel.commerceAccountId) LEFT JOIN CommerceOrder ON CommerceOrder.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId WHERE [$ORDER_STATUS$] [$ACCOUNT_ID$] (CommerceOrder.groupId = ?) AND (User_.userId = [$USER_ID$]) AND (LOWER(CommerceAccount.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ORDER BY CommerceOrder.modifieddate DESC

SELECT DISTINCT {CommerceOrder.*} FROM CommerceOrder WHERE (CommerceOrder.groupId = ?) AND (CommerceOrder.commerceAccountId = ?) AND (CommerceOrder.orderStatus = ?) AND ( ( (CommerceOrder.userId = ?) AND (CommerceOrder.status != 0) ) OR (CommerceOrder.status = 0) ) ORDER BY CommerceOrder.modifieddate DESC

SELECT DISTINCT {CommerceOrder.*} FROM CommerceOrder WHERE CommerceOrder.commerceOrderId IN ( SELECT DISTINCT CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderId FROM CommerceOrderItem JOIN CommerceShipmentItem ON CommerceShipmentItem.commerceOrderItemId = CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderItemId JOIN CommerceShipment ON CommerceShipment.commerceShipmentId = CommerceShipmentItem.commerceShipmentId WHERE (CommerceShipment.commerceShipmentId = ?) AND (CommerceShipment.status > 1) )

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderItemId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CommerceOrderItem INNER JOIN CommerceOrder ON CommerceOrder.commerceOrderId = CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderId WHERE (CommerceOrder.commerceAccountId = ?) AND (CommerceOrder.groupId = ?) AND (CommerceOrder.orderStatus IN ([$ORDER_STATUS$])) AND (CommerceOrderItem.shippedQuantity < CommerceOrderItem.quantity)
SELECT {CommerceOrderItem.*} FROM CommerceOrderItem WHERE (CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderId = ?) AND (CommerceOrderItem.quantity > CommerceOrderItem.shippedQuantity)

SELECT {CommerceOrderItem.*} FROM CommerceOrderItem INNER JOIN CommerceOrder ON CommerceOrder.commerceOrderId = CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderId WHERE (commerceAccountId = ?) AND (CommerceOrderItem.groupId = ?) AND (CommerceOrder.orderStatus IN ([$ORDER_STATUS$])) AND (CommerceOrderItem.shippedQuantity < CommerceOrderItem.quantity) ORDER BY CommerceOrderItem.sku ASC, CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderId ASC
SELECT SUM(CommerceOrderItem.quantity) AS SUM_VALUE FROM CommerceOrderItem WHERE (CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderId = ?) AND (CommerceOrderItem.parentCommerceOrderItemId = 0)

SELECT SUM(CommerceOrderItem.quantity) AS SUM_VALUE FROM CommerceOrderItem INNER JOIN CommerceOrder ON CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderId = CommerceOrder.commerceOrderId LEFT JOIN CommerceShipmentItem ON CommerceShipmentItem.commerceOrderItemId = CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderItemId WHERE (CommerceOrderItem.CPInstanceId = ?) AND (CommerceShipmentItem.commerceOrderItemId IS NULL) AND (CommerceOrder.status <> ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommerceShipment.commerceShipmentId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CommerceShipment LEFT JOIN CommerceShipmentItem ON CommerceShipmentItem.commerceShipmentId = CommerceShipment.commerceShipmentId INNER JOIN CommerceOrderItem ON CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderItemId = CommerceShipmentItem.commerceOrderItemId WHERE CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderId = ?

SELECT DISTINCT {CommerceShipment.*} FROM CommerceShipment LEFT JOIN CommerceShipmentItem ON CommerceShipmentItem.commerceShipmentId = CommerceShipment.commerceShipmentId INNER JOIN CommerceOrderItem ON CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderItemId = CommerceShipmentItem.commerceOrderItemId WHERE CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderId = ?

SELECT DISTINCT CommerceShipment.status FROM CommerceShipment LEFT JOIN CommerceShipmentItem ON CommerceShipmentItem.commerceShipmentId = CommerceShipment.commerceShipmentId INNER JOIN CommerceOrderItem ON CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderItemId = CommerceShipmentItem.commerceOrderItemId WHERE CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderId = ?

SELECT {CommerceShipmentItem.*} FROM CommerceShipmentItem INNER JOIN CommerceOrderItem ON CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderItemId = CommerceShipmentItem.commerceOrderItemId WHERE CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderItemId = ?
SELECT SUM(CommerceShipmentItem.quantity) AS SUM_VALUE FROM CommerceShipmentItem WHERE (CommerceShipmentItem.commerceShipmentId = ?) AND (CommerceShipmentItem.commerceOrderItemId = ?)

SELECT CommerceSubscriptionEntry.* FROM CommerceSubscriptionEntry WHERE (CommerceSubscriptionEntry.deliveryNextIterationDate IS NOT NULL) AND (CommerceSubscriptionEntry.deliveryNextIterationDate < ?) AND (CommerceSubscriptionEntry.deliverySubscriptionStatus = 0)

SELECT CommerceSubscriptionEntry.* FROM CommerceSubscriptionEntry WHERE (CommerceSubscriptionEntry.nextIterationDate IS NOT NULL) AND (CommerceSubscriptionEntry.nextIterationDate < ?) AND (CommerceSubscriptionEntry.subscriptionStatus = 0)

SELECT CommerceSubscriptionEntry.* FROM CommerceSubscriptionEntry INNER JOIN CommerceOrderItem ON CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderItemId = CommerceSubscriptionEntry.commerceOrderItemId INNER JOIN CommerceOrder ON CommerceOrder.commerceOrderId = CommerceOrderItem.commerceOrderId WHERE (CommerceOrder.commerceAccountId = ?) AND (CommerceSubscriptionEntry.subscriptionStatus = ?)
